abstract: mike collier to report raising $ 500k in race against patrick .
article: austin -- mike collier , a retired kingwood accounttant running as a democrat for lieutenant governor , on friday said he will report raising about $ 500,000 in his bid to unsert repubnlican incumbent dan patrick . collier said his campaign-finance report due monday will show he has about $ 143,000 in cash on hand . patrick , who had about $ 17 million in his campaign war chest last july , has not yet reported his fundraising totals for the last six months of 2017 . he raised about $ 4 million during the first part of 2017 .

collier has acknowledged he has a daunting battle ahead in his campaign to unseat the first-term , patrick , a former houston radio talk-show host who was state senator for eight years before he won the state 's no . 2 elective post in 2014 . patrick has statewide name id , while collier has much less . texas is overwhelmingly republican , and democrats last won a statewide elected office in 1994 . collier unsuccessfully ran for comptroller of public accounts in 2014 . republican glenn hegar won by more than 20 points .
